title: Speech Enhancement (GRU/LSTM/CRN)
short: Cleaning noisy audio using neural networks on VoiceBank-DEMAND.
description: Explored GRU, LSTM, and CRN architectures for speech enhancement. Preprocessed auditory data, trained and evaluated models, and analyzed PESQ/STOI improvements.

title: Yelp Review Rating Predictor
description: Built NLP pipeline with TF-IDF + linear model; experimented with GRU/LSTM sequence models. Evaluated with accuracy/MAE and calibration.

title: Predicting Supplemental Aflibercept Use
description: Built an ML pipeline on synthetic clinical datasets (mimicking OPTIC & LUNA) to predict supplemental aflibercept treatments. Explored Logistic Regression and Random Forest models, achieving up to 67% accuracy. Designed automated pipeline steps from data cleaning → training → prediction.
